Posts.Content: May 21, 2019 06:41AM - edited May 21, 2019 06:41AM by Evie10 Hi I totally understand what you are going through. I had my first set of biopsies 8 years ago. In the last 3 years I have had between 6-8 biopsies each year plus ultrasounds and mammograms every year. I couldn't possibly wait 6 months. In fact I collapsed with the stress at the last round and ended up in hospital after a panic attack. I'm know I can't keep doing this. You sound so much stronger than me. Evi
Posts.Title: Multiple cysts and dense tissue Kerri-on-cloud9 Evie10
